name: Liberating Spiritual Thought
description: Breaking free from religious indoctrination and reclaiming personal spiritual sovereignty.

cards.title: Deprogramming Religious Fear Tactics
cards.description: Understanding how fear-based religious narratives shape behavior and how to break free from them.
bulletpoints: How hell, sin, and divine punishment are used to control belief systems.
cards.summaryText: Explains trauma indoctrination, punishment narratives, and deconditioning tools to dissolve fear control.

cards.title: Reconstructing Authentic Spirituality
cards.description: Rebuilding a spiritual framework that is independent of institutional control.
bulletpoints: Separating authentic spiritual experiences from indoctrinated beliefs.
Exploring direct communion with the divine without intermediaries.
How to cultivate self-derived spiritual wisdom.
cards.summaryText: Guides rebuilding personal spirituality via direct experience and self-sourced wisdom.

cards.title: Restoring Individual Spiritual Sovereignty
cards.description: Empowering individuals to reclaim their personal spiritual path.
bulletpoints: Understanding how to build a personal, independent connection with the divine.
Developing critical thinking in spiritual matters.
Removing the dependency on external religious authority figures.
cards.summaryText: Supports sovereign practice through critical discernment and independence from outside authority.
